did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fife-Herndon-Strickler Family Photographs, Accession #5633-f, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of Anne E. H. Freudenberg, January 14, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 12 photographs, 1850?-1900, of members of the Fife, Herndon, Gordon, Strickler, Garnett, and related families of Albemarle County, Madison County, and Spotsylvania County, Virginia. Each photograph is numbered as follows:

1. Catherine Fife of Edinburgh, Scotland (sister of James Fife). Photo dated 1834 [sic]. 2. James Fife [1793-187 ], of Edinburgh, Middlesex County, Goochland County, and "Oak Lawn," Albemarle County. 3. Robert Herndon Fife [1843-1919] of "Oak Lawn" (son of James Fife). Photo [1860]. 4. Robert Herndon Fife. Photo [ca. 1890?]. 5. Sarah Anne Graves Strickler Fife [1845-1920] (Mrs. Robert Herndon Fife). Photo [ca. 1864]. 6. Margaret Whitler Fife(Mrs. William Crump Tucker, daughter of Robert Herndon Fife and Sarah Anne Graves Strickler Fife). Grace Strickler. Hinda Strickler (sister of Sarah Anne Graves Strickler Fife). Photo [ca. 1900?]. 7. Manuel Coffman Strickler of Madison County (father of Sarah Anne Graves Strickler Fife). 8. Mary Edward Strickler and Ormond Strickler (daughter and son of Sarah Anne Graves Strickler Fife). 9. Edgar Garnett Strickler (son of Mary Edward Strickler and Ormond Strickler). Photo [ca. 1900?]. 10. Mary Pannill (Mrs. Jacob Herndon, grandmother of Robert Herndon Fife). Photo [ca. 1850?]. 11. Lucy Gordon(Mrs. Marion Willis, cousin of Robert Herndon Fife). 12. Unidentified.
